An array of key-value pairs for the default connection.

An array of key-value pairs where the key is the connection name and the value is an array of connection params.

string

\Aura\Sql\Connection\AbstractConnection

Returns a "read" connection.

getRead() : \Aura\Sql\Connection\AbstractConnection

Picks a connection in this order:

  • A random slave; or,

  • If there are no slaves, a random master; or,

  • If there are no masters, the default connection.

Returns

The key for each element in the array is a name for the connection, and each value is an array of connection params (cf. the $default array elements).
